nodes.text: Grandfather was the name of an aggressive giant bormu living on Balmorra in the year 3643 BBY, when he was killed by an individual.

Grandfather appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion world boss on Balmorra. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
